title: What is a good news Wordpress theme? - Quora

response.answer_text: NewsEcho NewsEcho has a responsive and formal design with dark colors on the interface, which is built for heavy-content websites, but is commonly suitable for all blogs. It has modular and flexible homepage and build-in system, which enables users to modify the theme as they wish. In addition to some ordinary features such as unlimited color schemes, Retina ready, and Google analytics input, NewsEcho has many other outstanding features like 15 custom widgets, 16 design elements to style in the admin menu and so on.  TheSource Coming with a magazine style, this theme is able to catch people’s eyes effectively. You can display the image of the biggest news in the full-width homepage slider, and present a large number of contents in a well-organized way. In addition, by utilizing the three column grid, you can have the full control over the layout of your news site, achieving the visually appealing reading with ease.  DelicateNews For content heavy news websites, this WordPress theme is undoubtedly a good option. Featuring a structured layout, you can input loads of content without making your site cramped. In addition, with the responsive nature, it can adjust to different viewing devices automatically, displaying the content in a perfect manner.  Nillnews Just as the name suggests, this theme is a standard WordPress newspaper theme that is suitable to present news online. If you are a beginner who decides to build this kind of site, Nillnews is good to choose, for it has all the necessary features for a professional and clean news site.  Sahifa WordPress News, Magazine & Blog This is another typical news related theme that comes with a clean overall design. Developed to create the most informative new site, this theme features a superb scroll bar that allows website owners to update the latest breaking news in an obvious and prompt manner. The best of all, it doesn’t use any background images, which results an excellent reading experience with a fast page loading speed.  BlogNews With a newspaper-similar appearance, this theme is pretty suitable for any kinds of news sites, such as politics news, economy news, entertainment news, or sports news. The gird-based structure helps you present the content without a sense of messy. Also, just like the demo image showed in below, BlogNews is a perfect option if you pay some attention to advertising.  Nadia Unlike many other news themes we have recommended in this post, Nadia is a graphical-based on that is suited for some informal sites displaying entertainment information. Some of the main features include responsive design, featured slider, slide style menu, unlimited colors, full-width template, and custom background.  Headline This theme is mainly used to set up a sports news WordPress website. It comes with a drag and drop homepage, eight custom widgets, a responsive design, and a featured headline. Note that you are not limited to this kind of news site. With the multi-function nature, you can also build a site with content that is related to some other fields.  Observer This WordPress theme comes with a grid-based layout for well-structured display, a scroll bar for the latest breaking news, unlimited color options for a high level of customization and the responsive nature for various viewing devices. Note that Observer is a lightweight theme, which means a fast webpage loading speed.  BlackNews This theme is totally a responsive one, which can display your content effectively no matter what devices your readers are using. Featuring a headline section and a full-width image showcase section, you can highlight the latest news and the hottest issues with ease. In addition, BlackNews features an auto image slider, auto post summarization, auto pagination, and auto social media integration, which guarantee users a high level of convenience.  Newspaper This is a typical news theme for WordPress based websites, with which you can showcase your well-written articles and blog posts with ease. In addition to the news site, this theme is also suitable for magazine sites, personal blogs, review sites and more. In addition to the common features available from most themes, this one supports videos from YouTube so you can show some news in a vivid manner. In addition, while integrating with bbPress and BuddyPress, this special theme allows you to start an inner community with ease. The design of it is of the standard news theme. However, their slider section allows you to place your images in a creative manner.  Newsmag Pro This is professional news and magazine WordPress theme. It has the modern design that is perfect for websites showcasing the hot news, events and activities. For the better content display, this theme includes the enhanced header and footer navigation, article timeline, easy “back-to-the-top” button, recent posts widget, posts video, posts video grid and posts list. While you may need the perfect website design, this theme is designed with the customizable and flexible layout.  Gillion One of the biggest highlights of this theme is the flexibility. You can choose among the versatile layouts to locate the web content the way you like. There are 6 post layouts, 5 open post layouts and 5 slider layouts. Also, there are 4 header options so you can decide the best header style for your news site. Some other features of this theme include the easy-to-use visual composer, drag & drop site builder, MaiChimp integration, bookmarking system, powerful Options Panel and SEO optimized.  More information can be found from https://whatswp.com/best-wordpress-newspaper-theme/
